project.title: AI Image Classifier
project.description: A convolutional neural network model trained to classify images into 10 distinct categories using Python and TensorFlow.

project.title: Sorting Visualizer
project.description: An interactive web application to visualize sorting algorithms like Bubble Sort, Merge Sort, and Quick Sort in real-time.

project.title: Student Portfolio
project.description: A responsive portfolio website created using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and XML to display academic achievements.

project.title: Hospital DBMS
project.description: A comprehensive database management system designed for hospital records using SQL and PHP.
